channel.title: CVE Feed for FANUC -- ROBOGUIDE
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FANUC -- ROBOGUIDE

item.title: CVE-2021-43933|2024-09-17T00:11:27.669Z -- fanuc -- roboguide
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to a network-based attack by threat actors sending unimpeded requests to the receiving server, which could cause a denial-of-service condition due to lack of heap memory resources.

item.title: CVE-2021-43988|2024-09-17T02:26:52.591Z -- fanuc -- roboguide
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to a network-based attack by threat actors utilizing crafted naming conventions of files to gain unauthorized access rights.

item.title: CVE-2021-43986|2024-09-17T01:07:03.014Z -- fanuc -- roboguide
item.description: The setup program for the affected product configures its files and folders with full access, which may allow unauthorized users permission to replace original binaries and achieve privilege escalation.
